display_gralloc.h
=================

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Display <display.md>`__

**Description:**

Declares the driver functions for memory.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

**Summary**\ 
-------------

   <p id="p1489526944093524">

GrallocInitialize (GrallocFuncs \**funcs)

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p256045231093524">

int32_t

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p593927137093524">

Initializes the memory module to obtain the pointer to functions for
memory operations.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>

.. raw:: html

   <tr id="row454310873093524">

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.1 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p2058431726093524">

GrallocUninitialize (GrallocFuncs \*funcs)

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   <td class="cellrowborder" valign="top" width="50%" headers="mcps1.1.3.1.2 ">

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p436348574093524">

int32_t

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   <p id="p674246264093524">

Deinitializes the memory module to release the memory allocated to the
pointer to functions for memory operations.

.. raw:: html

   </p>

.. raw:: html

   </td>

.. raw:: html

   </tr>
